template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic software engineering task in {technical_domain} that includes defining requirements, building components, testing, fixing issues, and deploying to an environment; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic software engineering task in infrastructure as code that includes defining requirements, building components, testing, fixing issues, and deploying to an environment; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Define requirements for a secure VPC, build its components in Terraform, test with linting and security scans, fix any issues, and deploy to a staging environment.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, user wants a concise prompt under 45 words about a realistic IaC task covering requirements to deployment. Need to include all specified phases: defining, building, testing, fixing, deploying.

Okay, infrastructure as code... maybe AWS or Azure example? Terraform could work. Should keep it generic but realistic. Testing often involves validation and security checks. Deployment to staging fits.

Let me structure: define requirements for VPC, build components like subnets and security groups, test with linter and scanner, fix issues, deploy to staging. That covers all elements.
